obasan-ga syoojiki-na bebisitaa-ga ani-ga imooto-o izimeta-to itta-to omotteiru
aunt-nom honest babysitter-nom brother-nom sister-acc teased-comp.said-comp. thinks
My aunt thinks that the honest babysitter said that my brother teased my sister.
